text.autoconfig.ranitils.title: Ranitils
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.wearable:
Allows any item in armor slots

§7put torch on you head
disabling this doesn't disable the wear command
§eThis does not work in creative mode
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.vertical:
Allows you to teleport vertically

§7zoop up
§4Use at your own risk as it can get you banned
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.autoSwit:
Automatically switches elytra and chestplate

§7swoop swop
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.roadRunn:
Allows you to mine flat while digging since it doesn't break blocks under you

§7good for teh haste minin
§7you can sneak to mine underneath
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.elytraRe:
Bounce with elytra instead of landing when holding down space

§7sweeep swop boing boing swop
§4Use at your own risk
key.ranitils.sendWaypoint: Send looking at position as waypoint
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.waypoint:
Make waypoints convert 
overworld coordinates to nether coordinates & vice versa

§7finally nether portal maker 3000
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.noWaypoi:
Disable the beam for waypoints

§7Bzuhzzzzzzzuhzzzzzuhzzzz §o(lightsaber noises)
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.waypoint:
Use a square target icon for waypoints

§7Why no cute? :(
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.bowInsta:
Allows you to instant kill entities with bow

§7i have a good gaming chair
§4Use at your own risk

Number of times velocity is incremented when firing
bigger number, more hungy it make you, but more damage
40 charges - 0 hunger taken ~33damage

§7§oima chargin mah laser
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.mineFree:
Removes 6 tick mining speed delay and Lets you keep breaking blocks when you switch items.

§7haha, mine go zoom now
text.autoconfig.ranitils.option.tridentE:
Removes Riptide's requirement for the player to be in Water/Rain and 10 tick charge time.

§7Trident goes brrrrrrrrrrr
§4Use at your own risk
